    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User​(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password,
            boolean isAdmin)
        User entity class. Creates a new User with username, and password, and an empty list of events.
        Parameters:
        username - username of this User
        password - password used by this User to login
        isAdmin - true if user is an admin user, false if basic user

    • Method Detail

      • setPassword

        public boolean setPassword​(java.lang.String newPassword)
        Returns true if new password is not the same as current password and changes password to newPassword. Records this change in this user's passwordEvents
        Parameters:
        newPassword - a new password to replace current password
        Returns:
        true if password change was successful, false otherwise.

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        get the user's password
        Returns:
        a String of the password

      • validate

        public boolean validate​(java.lang.String password)
        Used by usecases.user.LogInUseCase to validate if provided password is correct
        Parameters:
        password - provided password
        Returns:
        true if this user's password is equal to provided password

      • getEvents

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.time.LocalDateTime,​java.lang.String>> getEvents​(java.lang.String eventType)
        Getter for all events of a certain type for this user.
        Parameters:
        eventType - the desired type of event
        Returns:
        all events with the value of eventType for this user.

      • getEvents

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.time.LocalDateTime,​java.lang.String>> getEvents​(java.time.LocalDateTime startDateTime,
                                                                                                     java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime)
        Getter for all events within a certain datetime range for this user.
        Parameters:
        startDateTime - the start of the desired datetime range
        endDateTime - the end of the desired datetime range
        Returns:
        all events with a datetime key after startDateTime and before endDateTime for this user.

      • logEvent

        public void logEvent​(java.lang.String typeOfEvent)
        Log an event occurring for this user at the current time.
        Parameters:
        typeOfEvent - the type of event that occurred.

      • logEvent

        public void logEvent​(java.lang.String typeOfEvent,
                     java.time.LocalDateTime timeOfEvent)
        Log an event occuring for this user at a specified time (usually not the current time).
        Parameters:
        typeOfEvent - the type of event that occured.
        timeOfEvent - the specified date-time of the event.
